item.title: The RedBall Project art installation, Centraal Station, Antwerp, Belgium (© Brit Worgan/Getty Images)
item.description: 图文来源自：bing. copyright: © Brit Worgan/Getty Images Today’s homepage shows the RedBall Project at Centraal Station in Antwerp, Belgium. The station holds significant importance as one of the main junctions in the country and is among the four Belgian stations integrated into the high-speed rail network. This architectural masterpiece, designed by Louis Delacenserie, was built between 1895 and 1905, showcasing a blend of historic charm and contemporary functionality.
